Key Match Events: Emiliano Martinez made two crucial saves in the penalty shootout.
Lisandro Martínez scored for Argentina in the 35th minute.
Kevin Rodríguez scored for Ecuador in the 90'+1' minute.
Argentina won the penalty shootout 4-2 to advance to the semifinals.
